description_expanded: Better Homes & Gardens Apple Berry Rose Scented Wax Melts (2.5oz) is designed to deliver everyday reliability with thoughtful details suited for home fragrance. Scented wax melts in an Apple Berry Rose fragrance. Use with a wax warmer to fill your home with a sweet, fruity, and floral scent. Built for convenience and value, it balances quality materials with practical features you can rely on at home, on the go, or as a thoughtful gift.
